tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Researchers (
researcher_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
name STRING,
affiliation STRING,
research_experience INT
)

CREATE TABLE research_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    data VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  research_interests TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE QualitativeData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT,
  data TEXT,
  data_source VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(id)
)

CREATE TABLE Queries (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT,
  query_text TEXT,
  date_created TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(id)
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchProjects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  researcher_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  data_description TEXT,
  data_type VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES ResearchProjects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DataAnalysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  data_id INT,
  analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
  result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES ResearchData(data_id)
);

CREATE TABLE QueryLogs (
  query_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT,
  query_text TEXT,
  query_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);
